com.jfoenix.controls

Class JFXPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.PopupWindow
        • javafx.scene.control.PopupControl
          • com.jfoenix.controls.JFXPopup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    @DefaultProperty(value="popupContent")
public class JFXPopup
extends javafx.scene.control.PopupControl
    JFXPopup is the material design implementation of a popup.
    Since:
    2017-03-01
